body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.25 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Proper cursor support in the Mac driver.
Fixes for right-to-left support in RichEdit.
Initial version of a Wingdings font.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
